front.title: Survey of Domain Verification Techniques using DNS

abstract.t: Verification of ownership of domains in the Domain Name System (DNS) [RFC1034] [RFC1035] often relies on adding or editing DNS records within the domain. This document lays out the various techniques and the pros and cons of each. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/ShivanKaul/draft-sahib-domain-verification- techniques.
